newsitem.title: POLAND: Salomon rates Budimex as buy.
newsitem.headline: Salomon rates Budimex as buy.

text.p: Salomon Brothers rated Polish construction company Budimex SA as buy saying it was likely to benefit strongly from Poland's highway project and forecasting steady rise in profits, Salomon said in a May 19 report.
Salomon said at 32 zlotys, price of the recommendation, Budimex was the most attractively valued construction company in Poland.

"The company trades at 13 times our 1997 unconsolidated earnings multiple, a 25 percent discount to the market. Our consolidated earnings forecast puts Budimex at just 11 times 1997 earnings," the report said.
Budimex closed on Friday at 31.5 zlotys.
Salomon said Budimex net profit was likely to rise to 23 million zlotys in 1997 from 19 million last year.

It also said Budimex, through its 47-percent stake in Autostrada SA, was likely to capitalise on Poland's highway project scheduled to begin in Poland in the second half of 1997. -- Warsaw Newsroom +48 22 653 9700
